title: Schedule Preventive Maintenance
description: A maintenance planner needs to schedule the quarterly preventive maintenance (PM) for a critical CNC machine.

tasks.description: Retrieve the PM schedule for the specified CNC machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the quarterly PM task and sees it is due next month.

tasks.description: Coordinate with production to find a downtime window to perform the maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available 4-hour window on a Saturday.

tasks.description: Create a maintenance work order for the PM, assign a technician, and schedule it for the agreed-upon time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and schedules the PM work order.
